HelloWorld3

Description

HelloWorld3

Purpose

A more complex contract to say hello to the world.

Notes

Uses a transaction to set the greeting and a function to return the greeting.

Author

Stephen Newell

STATE VARIABLES

greeting

holds the Hello World greeting.

METHODS

getGreeting()

Purpose

Return the greeting.

Notes

Function returns a string with the current contract greeting.

Returns:

_0

greeting contract greeting value

setGreeting(string)

Purpose

Changes the greeting.

Notes

Update the contract greeting to this new message.

Parameters:

_greeting

new greeting message

EVENTS

None
